name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Provides income support to all landholding farmers' families to supplement their financial needs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Offers crop insurance to farmers to protect them against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Aims to enhance irrigation coverage and improve water use efficiency.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil health cards to farmers, which contain nutrient status of their soil along with recommendations for appropriate dosage of nutrients.

name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
description: An online trading platform for agricultural commodities to ensure better price discovery and marketing.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund
description: Provides financial support for the creation of post-harvest management infrastructure and community farming assets.

name: Sat Pagla Khedut Kalyanna
description: Promotes natural farming practices and provides financial assistance to farmers.

name: Pagala for Natural Farming
description: Supports natural farming by offering training and resources to farmers.

name: New Agricultural Marketing Infrastructure (AMI)
description: Aims to improve agricultural marketing infrastructure.

name: Agri Clinics and Agri Business Centres Scheme (ACABC)
description: Provides financial assistance to set up agri-clinics and business centers.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Offers crop insurance to farmers against natural risks.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Provides credit facilities to farmers for agricultural needs.

name: Micro Irrigation Scheme
description: Promotes efficient water use through micro-irrigation systems.

name: Tamil Nadu Irrigated Agriculture Modernization Project (TNIAMP)

description: Provides soil health cards to farmers to improve soil quality.
